title: Roamfree.com Ad type
content:
hi all, i was at the melbourne airport (australia) when i spotted this ad for roamfree.com and i didn’t know the type, but quite liked it.

any help in finidng out what it is would be great! thanks!

- sye :)

 [‹ Galactica intro credits font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080201131056/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41471 "Go to previous forum topic") [Root:1 Wine ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080201131056/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41456 "Go to next forum topic")
author: varultz

comments.content:
ok, the attachemtn didn’t work.... crazy.... here is a link:
